data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Indolipa Emeljanov, 2001 from China (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Cixiidae: Pentastirini), with a checklist of world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guo, Hong-Wei, Feng, Ji-Nian (2010): A new species of the genus Indolipa Emeljanov, 2001 from China (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Cixiidae: Pentastirini), with a checklist of world species. Zootaxa 2668: 33-43, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276421
